document_data.mainbody:
The Parched Mamluk Society, also known as the Parched, was a military organization in Zakhara.
The Parched was one of the smallest mamluk organizations in Zakhara. They were dedicated to a single task to ensure the security of Talabs water supply. They were in charge of maintaining the system of aqueducts that brought the water from the distant Al-Sayaj Mountains
The Parched were led by Akbara Abd al-Yahruq, the Most Respected Warrior.
Talab was the center of operations for the Parched.
